方法详细信息

as

EntityReply<E> as(Class<? extends AbstractTransport> transport)
Directs sitebricks to use the given Guice key as a transport to marshall the provided entity to the client. Example: 
   return Reply.with(new Person(..)).as(Xml.class);

Will marhall the given Person object into XML using the Guice Key bound to [Xml.class] (by default this is an XStream based XML transport).

excludes

EntityReply<E> excludes(String excludeFields)
When as json.class or xml.class exclude some fields

参数：
excludeFields - to exclude fields
the fields format is "firstField,secondField,...,lastField"
返回：

includes

EntityReply<E> includes(String includeFields)
When parse as json.class or xml.class include some fields

参数：
includeFields - to include fields
the fields format is "firstField,secondField,...,lastField"
返回：

excludes

EntityReply<E> excludes(String... excludeFields)
When parse as json.class or xml.class exclude some fields

参数：
excludeFields - to exclude fields array
返回：

includes

EntityReply<E> includes(String... includeFields)
When as json.class or xml.class exclude some fields

参数：
includeFields - to exclude fields array
返回：

dateFormatString

EntityReply<E> dateFormatString(String dateFormatString)
When parse as json.class or xml.class set the special date format

参数：
dateFormatString - date format string eg. "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
the default format is "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"
返回：

dateFormatMode

EntityReply<E> dateFormatMode(DateFormatMode dateFormatMode)
When parse as json.class or xml.class set the special date format

参数：
dateFormatMode - date format mode eg. DateFormatMode.YYYYMMDDHHMMSS
the default format is DateFormatMode.YYYYMMDDHHMMSS
返回：

type

EntityReply<E> type(String mediaType)
The media type of the response data to send to the client. I.e. the mime-type. Example "application/json" for JSON responses.

headers

EntityReply<E> headers(Map<String,String> headers)
A Map of headers to set directly on the response.

header

EntityReply<E> header(String key,
                      String value)
a header to set directly on the response.

downloadFileName

EntityReply<E> downloadFileName(String fileName)
a header to set directly on the response.

status

EntityReply<E> status(int code)
Set a custom status code (call this last, it will be overridden if other response code directives are called afterward).
